$comment: Example MCP Configuration for projects using TemporalBridge

description.setup: To use TemporalBridge in your project:
steps: 1. Copy this file to your project root as .mcp.json
2. Update the 'cwd' path to point to your temporal-bridge installation
3. Set ZEP_API_KEY environment variable with your Zep Cloud API key
4. Optional: Set DEVELOPER_ID to customize your user identifier (default: 'developer')
5. Optional: Set GROUP_ID to override auto-generated project group name
6. Start Claude Code in your project directory
description.storage: All conversations stored in single user graph with project metadata
description.sharing: Use share_knowledge tool to copy knowledge to project groups
search_tools: search_all - Both personal and project memories
